en-US.title: Hello, World!
en-US.description: Create a 'Hello World' application that runs on devices running Windows 10 IoT Core

en-US.title: Hello Blinky (Headless App)
en-US.description: Create an app with no UI that toggles an LED on devices running Windows 10 IoT Core

en-US.title: UI Blinky App
en-US.description: Create a UI-based app that toggles an LED on devices running Windows 10 IoT Core

en-US.title: Blinky Webserver
en-US.description: Create a Webserver app that controls an LED on devices running Windows 10 IoT Core

en-US.title: IoT Core Default App
en-US.description: Create a UWP app that provides a device-management experience for Windows 10 IoT Core

en-US.title: I2C/SPI Accelerometer
en-US.description: Create an app leveraging I2C or SPI on devices running Windows 10 IoT Core

en-US.title: SPI Display
en-US.description: Create an app using SPI on devices running Windows 10 IoT Core

en-US.title: AllJoyn Connectivity
en-US.description: Learn more about AllJoyn and explore the capabilities of the AllJoyn Device System Bridge with Windows 10 IoT Core

en-US.title: Driver Sample
en-US.description: Create and interact with a universal driver on devices running Windows 10 IoT Core

en-US.title: I2C Port Expander
en-US.description: Create an app that uses the Raspberry Pi 2 I2C bus to communicate with a port expander.

en-US.title: Serial-In, Parallel-Out Shift Register
en-US.description: Create an app that uses the Raspberry Pi 2 to control LEDs using a serial-in, parallel-out shift register.

en-US.title: RGB LED
en-US.description: Create an app that uses the Raspberry Pi 2 to toggle an RGB LED.

en-US.title: Push Button
en-US.description: Create an app that uses the Raspberry Pi 2 to read the status of a Push Button and control an LED.

en-US.title: Potentiometer Sensor Sample
en-US.description: A analog sensor is connected to Raspberry Pi through ADC converter and digital output data is displayed through Monitor and LED.

en-US.title: GpioTestTool (Console)
en-US.description: This simple command line utility shows how to use the Gpio WinRT APIs from standard C++.

en-US.title: I2cTestTool (Console)
en-US.description: This simple utility shows how to use C++/CX in command line programs.

en-US.title: SpiTestTool (Console)
en-US.description: Write and read from SPI devices on the command line.

en-US.title: Express Node.js App (UWP)
en-US.description: Create an Express Node.js app that runs on devices running Windows 10 IoT Core

en-US.title: Digital Signage Sample
en-US.description: Showcases a Digital Sign app running on Windows 10 IoT Core

en-US.title: Serial UART Sample (Windows Universal)
en-US.description: Create an app to read and write to UART interfaces on Windows IoT core

en-US.title: USB Web camera Sample (Windows Universal)
en-US.description: Create an app to take photo, record video and audio using a USB Web Camera on Windows IoT core

en-US.title: Cylon Node.js App (Console)
en-US.description: Control an Arduino with a Cylon Node.js app running on a Raspberry Pi 2 with Windows 10 IoT Core

en-US.title: Bluetooth Low Energy GATT Sample (Windows Universal)
en-US.description: Learn how to interact with Bluetooth Low Energy devices on Windows 10 IoT core.

en-US.title: IoT Browser Sample (Windows Universal)
en-US.description: Learn how to create a simple web browser for Windows 10 IoT core.

en-US.title: GPIO OneWire (C++)
en-US.description: Create an app that uses GPIO to read from the DHT11, a temperature and humidity sensor that uses a single-wire protocol.

en-US.title: Cylon Node.js App (UWP)
en-US.description: Control a servo connected to an Arduino with a Cylon Node.js UWP app running on a Raspberry Pi 2 with Windows 10 IoT Core

en-US.title: OneNote API
en-US.description: Learn how to use http messages to GET and POST OneNote pages in Wiring.

en-US.title: RGB Pixel Strip
en-US.description: Learn how to use an RGB Pixel Strip in Wiring.

en-US.title: LCD Screen
en-US.description: Learn how to use an LCD Screen in Wiring.

en-US.title: Stepper Motor
en-US.description: Learn how to use a Stepper Motor in Wiring.

en-US.title: Weather Station
en-US.description: Learn how to create a Weather Station in Wiring.

en-US.title: Lightning Providers samples (UWP)
en-US.description: Demonstrating the use of Microsoft.IoT.Lightning.Providers in UWP apps

en-US.title: Controlling DC Motors
en-US.description: Learn to control DC motors using a Windows IoT Core enabled device!

en-US.title: Console App
en-US.description: Create a console app that monitors memory usage on devices running Windows 10 IoT Core

en-US.title: Launching an external program
en-US.description: Learn how to use Windows.System.ProcessLauncher API to launch external executable programs from your UWP app

en-US.title: Connecting to a WiFi Network
en-US.description: Learn how to discover and connect to a WiFi network from a UWP app using Windows.Devices.WiFi.WiFiAdapter API

en-US.title: App Installation Sample
en-US.description: Learn how to install and deploy an app on Windows IoT Core
